title: How to know if your iPhone or iPad is being tracked by your
description: Any iPhone or iPad being tracked by an employer will soon display a message on the Lock screen that reads, "this iPhone is managed by your organization." Users with a company owned device can also navigate to Settings > General > About to see if their internet traffic is being watched and if their device can be tracked.

title: Get started with a supervised iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch - Apple
description: 15-01-2020 If your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch is supervised, it means that the organization which owns your device has the ability to install a profile to control what features your device has access to. If you want to see what features your administrator has modified from the default iOS settings, youll need to check your settings.
